Name 

public string Name

Field Value

string

Stretch

Stretch determines the size of the rect based on the parent rect size. Values are relative and in range 0 - 1. If Stretch values are 0 than the size of the rect can be set manually without it being changed by the parent rect size.

public Vector2 Stretch

Field Value

Vector2
